schema.name: date_stop
schema.description: The end date for your data. This is controlled by the date range you've selected for your reporting view.

schema.name: date_start
schema.description: The start date for your data. This is controlled by the date range you've selected for your reporting view.

schema.name: account_id
schema.description: The ID number of your ad account, which groups your advertising activity. Your ad account includes your campaigns, ads and billing.

schema.name: account_name
schema.description: The name of your ad account, which groups your advertising activity. Your ad account includes your campaigns, ads and billing.

schema.name: campaign_id
schema.description: The unique ID number of the ad campaign you're viewing in reporting. Your campaign contains ad sets and ads.

schema.name: campaign_name
schema.description: The name of the ad campaign you're viewing in reporting. Your campaign contains ad sets and ads.

schema.name: adset_id
schema.description: The unique ID of the ad set you're viewing in reporting. An ad set is a group of ads that share the same budget, schedule, delivery optimization and targeting.

schema.name: adset_name
schema.description: The name of the ad set you're viewing in reporting. An ad set is a group of ads that share the same budget, schedule, delivery optimization and targeting.

schema.name: ad_id
schema.description: The unique ID of the ad you're viewing in reporting.

schema.name: ad_name
schema.description: The name of the ad you're viewing in reporting.

schema.name: impressions
schema.description: The number of times your ads were on screen.

schema.name: clicks
schema.description: The number of clicks on your ads.

schema.name: spend
schema.description: The estimated total amount of money you've spent on your campaign, ad set or ad during its schedule. This metric is estimated.

schema.name: objective
schema.description: The objective reflecting the goal you want to achieve with your advertising. It may be different from the selected objective of the campaign in some cases.

schema.name: reach
schema.description: The number of Accounts Center accounts that saw your ads at least once. Reach is different from impressions, which may include multiple views of your ads by the same Accounts Center accounts. This metric is estimated.
